# Animated Palettes



## Installation

```r
devtools::install_github("Eomesodermin/animated")
```

## Usage

```{r, palettes_dummy}
library("animated")

# See all palettes
names(animated_palettes)
```

## Palettes

### Aladdin

```{r, Aladdin}
animated("A_Bugs_life")
```
